sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Input from '../Input'
import FormGroup from '.' 

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"formgroup"}}>{`FormGroup`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A container for any type of form controls. It supports label, error and helpers.`}</MDXTag>

  <FormGroup
    id='input'
    label='Input Label'
    helper='Some hint for the input here'
    error='This field is invalid'
  >
    <div style={{ height: 100, backgroundColor: 'hotpink', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', border: '5px dotted black' }}>

    </div>
  </FormGroup>
